boot.asm.description: System startup: mmap surface, install handlers, enter REPL

decode.asm.description: x86 instruction decoder for self-reading and verification

dispatch.asm.flow: token → ctx=hash(prev) → predict → HIT/MISS → learn on miss
gotchas: ctx = hash(prev_token) ONLY, no somatic XOR (breaks pattern identity)
rcx is caller-saved, use r10-r15 in loops that call functions
Token abstraction must match in BOTH process_input AND digest_file
All struct_ctx operations use f64 (holo_*), not f32 (vsa_*)

dreams.asm.description: Offline consolidation: replay misses, speculate, commit

entries.name: dream_cycle
entries.returns: void ; replay miss buffer, emit speculative

entries.name: dream_extract_schemas
entries.returns: void ; holographic schema extraction + self-model awareness

gotchas: NURSERY patterns need 50+ steps before judgment
Schema trace decays each dream (0.5x) to allow new patterns
Promoted patterns must be reinforced via holo_store
Uses cosine similarity (normalized) not raw dot product

drives.asm.description: Homeostatic drive system: thresholds, goals, actions

entries.name: drives_check
entries.returns: check all drives vs thresholds, trigger actions

entries.name: drives_show
entries.returns: display current drive levels and thresholds

emit.asm.description: Code emission: write x86 dispatch patterns to surface

evolve.asm.description: Genetic evolution: reproduce, mutate, crossover regions

factor.asm.description: Subroutine extraction: find common suffixes, create shared code

entries.name: factor_suffix
entries.returns: main: scan regions, extract shared suffixes

entries.name: verify_valid_call
entries.returns: eax=1 if addr points to valid sub

format.asm.description: Output formatting: integers, floats, hex, strings

gate.asm.description: Predictive gating: test modifications in sandbox before commit

genes.asm.description: Gene Pool: metabolic recycling of condemned regions

entries.name: gene_pool_sample
entries.returns: ctx in eax, token in edx (or 0 if empty)

entries.name: gene_pool_show
entries.returns: display pool status and top genes

gotchas: XFillRectangle/XDrawRectangle/XDrawLine take 7 args: 7th (height) goes on stack at [rsp]
XDrawString takes 7 args: 7th (length) goes on stack
Stack alignment (x86-64 ABI): ODD pushes → aligned → sub must be multiple of 16
display/gc/window are module-local BSS; must call gfx_init first
Colors are 0x00RRGGBB format

gui/mcp_client.asm.flow: mcp_init spawns server, mcp_call sends JSON-RPC, parses response
gotchas: Response buffer is static, overwritten each call
JSON-RPC uses Content-Length header framing
MCP server spawns UHMA internally
Stack alignment (x86-64 ABI): ODD pushes → aligned → sub must be multiple of 16
Stack alignment (x86-64 ABI): ODD pushes → aligned → sub must be multiple of 16
gfx_fill_rect takes 5 args: edi=x, esi=y, edx=w, ecx=h, r8d=color
Callee-saved regs (rbx, r12-r15) must be preserved across gfx_* calls
ecx is caller-saved: reload h from memory before each gfx call, don't push/pop

gui/viz_main.asm.description: Main entry point for UHMA GUI (MCP wrapper)
gui/viz_main.asm.flow: main → mcp_init → vis_init → loop(vis_update, usleep) → vis_shutdown → mcp_shutdown
gotchas: Link with: gcc -lX11 -lc -no-pie (NOT ld directly)
MCP server spawned as subprocess (python3 tools/rag/server.py)
vis_update returns 0 to quit, 1 to continue
16ms usleep ≈ 60fps frame rate
Stack alignment (x86-64 ABI): ODD pushes → aligned → sub must be multiple of 16

hooks.asm.description: Event hook system: register callbacks, fire events

entries.name: fire_hook
entries.returns: call all handlers for hook_id with arg

entries.name: update_presence_dispatch
entries.returns: run presence regions for hormonal control

io.asm.description: Syscall wrappers, file digestion, motor system
gotchas: Token abstraction MUST match dispatch.asm:process_input exactly
Fault handler longjmps to REPL - save fault_safe_rsp/rip before process_token
rcx clobbered by calls, use r10-r15 in digest loop
Restore r14 (SURFACE_BASE) after fault recovery in continue_loop

learn.asm.description: Learning: emit new patterns, strengthen/weaken existing
learn.asm.flow: holo_store → check redundant → find_existing → emit → wire → STDP
gotchas: Always holo_store first (never fails, just gets denser)
Check receipt trace BEFORE emitting (avoid redundant patterns)

maturity.asm.description: Developmental stage gating: earn capabilities through stability

entries.name: maturity_check_advance
entries.returns: check if ready to advance stage

modify.asm.description: Self-modification primitives: prune, promote, specialize, generalize

observe.asm.description: Self-observation: scan regions, compute metrics, update presence
observe.asm.flow: walk regions → compute accuracy → prune/promote → update presence/drives
gotchas: Prune threshold (0.1) and age (PRUNE_MIN_AGE) are tunable
receipt_resonate can veto prune if we've regretted before

entries.name: gene_export
entries.returns: export gene pool to portable format

presence.asm.description: Hormonal modulator: presence regions for emotional reflexes

receipt.asm.description: Unified Holographic Receipt Layer + Cognitive Self-Model
gotchas: emit_receipt_full for MISS must include predicted token (diagnostic key)
receipt_resonate returns f64 similarity, not bool
No working buffer - all history is holographic, only last miss stored for "why"
Causal queries need receipts with aux=accuracy*1000 (emitted by modify.asm)
Commands are plain words, NOT :prefixed
New command = add string match + .not_X + .cmd_X handler
quit must call surface_freeze before exit
listen command uses LISTENER_HOLO | LISTENER_PRINT only (working buffer removed)

signal.asm.description: Fault handling: SIGSEGV/SIGFPE/SIGBUS recovery to REPL
signal.asm.flow: fault → handler → check fault_safe_rsp → longjmp to REPL
gotchas: MUST save fault_safe_rsp/rip BEFORE calling code that might fault
After fault recovery, r14 (SURFACE_BASE) may be clobbered - reload it
Max 3 consecutive faults before forced return (anti-loop)
Breakpoint handler must preserve all regs except rax

surface.asm.description: Surface memory: mmap, region allocation, compaction

entries.name: region_condemn
entries.returns: mark region for death (extracts gene first)

entries.name: broadcast_pain
entries.returns: share pain to colony (if shared mode)

symbolic.asm.description: Symbolic observation: log modifications, block only crashes

entries.name: sym_is_anomalous
entries.returns: eax=1 if addr is known anomaly

trace.asm.description: Token journey tracing: record token path through system

verify.asm.description: Runtime verification: validate self-modifications before commit

vsa.asm.description: Vector Symbolic Architecture: 1024-dim f64 holographic operations
gotchas: All holo_* funcs use f64[1024], legacy vsa_* use f32[1024]
holo_gen_vec is deterministic: same seed = same vector
Superposition accumulates - trace gets denser, needs decay

vsa_ops.asm.description: Code-to-Vector: geometric safety via high-dim embeddings
